_header: When Rome is removed into England
Note: All MSS show considerable variations, but derive from an original short prophecy, Scottish in sympathy, developing some of the symbols used by Geoffrey of Monmouth.
_description: The Second Scottish Prophecy, the B Text — in couplets

BLCottVesEVIII.Note:
This MS has a Latin prose text on these leaves; but whole MS is well beyond the dates covered by Boffey  and  Edwards (2005)
XJulia Boffey,   and  A. S. G. Edwards.  
             A New Index of Middle English Verse.
         London: The British Library, 2005.
